text: Surrounding the throne were twenty-four other thrones, and 4:4 sitting on the thrones were the twenty-four elders ¦ I saw the twenty-four elders sitting on the thrones PCK TR ¦ sitting on the thrones were twenty-four elders CTsitting on the thrones were the twenty-four elders. They were clothed in white garments and had golden crowns on their heads.
